# isConnected

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the continuity device because it’s connected to the system.

## Declaration

```swift
var isConnected: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of the property can change from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], but not the reverse. Instead, the system creates a new [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContinuityDevice] instance when the same physical device reconnects to the system.
